title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIII, pt. 503 - Adjudicatory Proceedings
content:

State Regulations
§ 503.1 - Background and intent
§ 503.2 - Legal base
§ 503.3 - Applicability

§ 503.6 - Hearing procedures: temporary suspension or limitation of an operating certificate
§ 503.7 - Hearing procedures: issuance of a cease and desist order

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIII, pt. 503

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§7.09, 31.05, 31.16, 31.17, 31.19, 31.22, 31.23, 43.02

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
